title: Awki
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here and here.John Crester, an eleven year old boy, narrates this charming story that reminds us what is important in life.John is the son of Henry Crester, a self-made millionaire, who was adopted from a Peruvian orphanage by a Nebraska farmer.Henry is successful in business but is failing in life. Henry is twice divorced, and failing in his relationship with his son, and with his adoptive father.Henry hires a detective agency to find his Peruvian father and bring him to Nebraska for a visit.The Peruvian Indian, descendant from the Inca's, is poor in material wealth but rich in tradition and rich in spirit. When he arrives in Nebraska he discovers that his son and grandson are rich in material wealth but devoid of tradition and poor in spirit. He quickly wins over his grandson but takes him longer to win over his son.It is a story of love, regret, change and second chances.
author: Carlos Barreda
